# List all assets packs for an app

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get information about the Apple-hosted background assets for a specific app.

## Getting background asset information

- **List the assets packs IDs for an app**: Get a list of the Apple hosted background asset IDs for a specific app.

items.description: Get a list of the Apple hosted background asset IDs for a specific app.
